md:
giải nghĩa từ "banking" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Banking (n) - Ngân hàng
	+ Meaning: The business of providing financial services, such as accepting deposits, making loans, and facilitating transactions.
	+ Example sentence: The banking industry has undergone significant changes in recent years.
	+ Related words: bank, finance, money, transaction, loan.

* Banking (v) - Đánh ngân hàng
	+ Meaning: To engage in the business of providing financial services, especially as a bank.
	+ Example sentence: The company has been banking with us for over 10 years.
	+ Related words: bank, finance, money, transaction, loan.

* Banking (adj) - Liên quan đến ngân hàng
	+ Meaning: Relating to or involving the business of banking.
	+ Example sentence: The banking sector is heavily regulated.
	+ Related words: bank, finance, money, transaction, loan.

Note: The meanings and example sentences are provided in English, and the translations are provided in Vietnamese.

  • Banking (v) - Đánh ngân hàng

    • Example sentence: The company has been banking with us for over 10 years.
    • Related words: bank, finance, money, transaction, loan.

  • Banking (adj) - Liên quan đến ngân hàng

Note: The meanings and example sentences are provided in English, and the translations are provided in Vietnamese.
